trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when there is a problem communicating with the security token service.
trans-unit.target: 當發生與安全性權杖服務通訊的問題時，所擲回的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The problem can be caused by the following conditions: (1) Network failure (2) Failure to reach the MEX endpoint (3) Security token service does not have a valid endpoint identity
trans-unit.target: 問題可能因下列條件: （1） 網路失敗 （2） 無法到達 MEX 端點 （3） 安全性權杖服務沒有有效的端點身分識別

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.StsCommunicationException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.StsCommunicationException" /> 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.StsCommunicationException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.StsCommunicationException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the error.
Initializes an instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.StsCommunicationException" /> class with the specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的錯誤訊息，初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.StsCommunicationException" /> 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式 (Constructor) 會將新執行個體的 <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> 屬性初始化為系統提供用來描述錯誤的訊息。

trans-unit.source: The content of the message should also be understandable to the user.
trans-unit.target: 訊息的內容也應該要讓使用者能夠讀懂。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> object that contains the serialized object data about the exception that is being thrown.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> 物件，包含關於擲回例外狀況的序列化物件資料。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> object that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> 物件，包含關於來源或目的端的內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.StsCommunicationException" /> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 使用序列化的資料，初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.StsCommunicationException" /> 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: 進行還原序列化 (Deserialization) 期間會呼叫這個建構函式，以便重新構成經由資料流傳送的例外狀況物件。

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the error.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 做為目前例外狀況發生原因的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.StsCommunicationException" /> class with the specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的錯誤訊息以及此例外原因之內部例外狀況的參考，初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.StsCommunicationException" /> 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 被擲回以做為前一個例外狀況直接結果的例外狀況，應該在 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 屬性中包含對前一個例外狀況的參考。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 屬性會傳回與傳入建構函式中相同的值；如果 `null` 屬性沒有提供內部例外值給建構函式，則傳回 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>。
